SA20n1298:4: bodhisattvaḥ kāmayate vinetuṃ sattvānaparhartuṃ duḥkhānyācarati tasmātkṣāntim |
SA20n1298:10: vibhajya darśayati yo dvepo yā ca kṣāntiryaśca tayorvipāka itīdaṃ bodhisattvasyādikṣānticittam ||
SA20n1298:14: caritvā mahatīmanuttarāṃ kṣānti sattveṣu pariṇāmyātmanā salābhinaḥ karotītyubhayalābhaḥ |
SA20n1298:15: kṣānticaryāhetorlabhate janamataṃ yāvallabhate buddhasya śobhanottamāni lakṣaṇānuvyañjanānīti niṣpādayati bodhimārgam ||
SA20n1298:19: yadi kaścanākrośati nindati tāḍayati yāvatāharati tatsarvaṃ kṣamate |
SA20n1298:20: paśyansattvānatrāṇe bhaye ca vyatiharati tairātmānaṃ na ca śrāmyatīti kāyakṣāntiḥ ||
SA20n1298:24: mṛpaiva dūṣyamāṇo nirnimittamabhyākhyātaḥ sarvaṃ kṣamata iti vākkṣāntiḥ ||
SA20n1298:27: nindāpakīrtiṣvati citte bhavati nivaira iti manaḥkṣānti ||
SA20n1298:33: yadyanucitameva māmapakaroti māmapahanti tadā cintayenna kṛto mayāparādho'tītakarmaṇāmevaitatkāritaṃ tena soḍhavyameca |
SA20n1298:34: punarevaṃ vibhāvayedyatvāri bhūtānīmāni pañcaskaṃghapratyayairabhisaṃhatāni yāni tāḍayante tāḍayanti ca |
SA20n1298:35: punarevaṃ paśyedyatsa puruṣo'jña ivonmatta iveti mayā karuṇāyitavyaṃ kimuta na kṣantavyam ||
SA20n1298:43: ahaṃ cettaṃ pratikupyeyaṃ durgatimadhigaccheyamanāgate'dhvani vedayeyaṃ mahāduḥkham |
SA20n1298:44: pratyayairebhirmama kāyaścedbhidyeta viśīryeta mayā notpādanīyo dvepaḥ |
SA20n1298:45: pratyayānāmatītakarmaṇāmetaditi gambhīraṃ pratyavekṣaṇīyam karūṇācaraṇīyā maitrī ca |
SA20n1298:47: yadyehaṃ na prabhavāmyevamalpamapi duḥkhaṃ soḍhuṃ na ca śaknomi damayituṃ svacittaṃ tatkathamahaṃ prabhaviṣyāmi vinetuṃ sattvānvimocayituṃ sarvānakuśaladharmānpūrayitumanuttaraṃ falam ||
SA20n1298:48: 8 | yo hi dhīmānsukhena kṣāntimācarati labhate sa ākāravaiśiṣṭyam |
SA20n1298:49: bahudhanau bhavati janāstamavalokya muditā bhavanti sukhitāśca bhavanti sukhitāśca bhavanti mānayantyanu vartante ca |
SA20n1298:50: puruṣaṃ cedvikalāṅgaṃ paśyedvībhatsadarśanaṃ vikalendriyamakiñcanaṃ jāniyāttadidaṃ dvepapratyayaiḥ kāritam |
SA20n1298:63: puruṣaścedimāni pūrayati daśa vastṛmi jñātavyaṃ śaknoti sa puruṣaḥ kṣāntimācaritum ||
SA20n1298:64: 10 | bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pariśuddhāyāṃ yadācarati caramāyāṃ kṣāntau praviśate śūnyatāmalakṣaṇamapraṇihitamasaṃskṛtam |
SA20n1298:65: na ca dṭaṣṭijñānapraṇihitasaṃskṛtaiḥ saṃpariṣvakto bhavati nāpi ca śūnyatā'lakṣaṇāpraṇihitāsaṃskṛteṣu rajyati |
SA20n1298:66: dṛṣṭijñānapraṇihitasaṃskṛtaṃ sarvamevaśūnyamityevaṃvidhā kṣāntiradvayalakṣaṇā pariśuddhā caramā kṣāntirityucyate |
SA20n1298:67: yadi viśati saṃyojanaparikṣayaṃ yadi viśati śāntaṃ nirvāṇamasaṃpṛktajātimaraṇaṃ na cāsya rāgo bhavati saṃyojanakṣaye na ca śānte na nirvāṇe |
SA20n1298:68: saṃyojanajātijarāmaraṇaṃ sarvaṃ śūnyamityevaṃvidhā kṣāntiradvayalakṣaṇā pariśuddhā caramā kṣāntirityucyate |
SA20n1298:69: bhāvo na svato jāyate na parato jāyate na dvābhyāṃ jāyate |
SA20n1298:70: api ca nāstyupādo na cocchedo na ca vināśo na cāvināśo na kṣaya ityevaṃvidhā kṣāntiradvayalakṣaṇā pariśuddhā caramā kṣāntirityucyate |
SA20n1298:71: na kṛtākṛtaṃ nāsaṃgo na bhedo na niṣpattirna caryā notpādavīryaṃ na karaṇotpāda ityevaṃvidhā kṣāntiranutpādakṣāntiḥ |
SA20n1298:73: bodhisattva ācarati kṣāntiṃ bhāvalakṣaṇaśūnyatāṃ sattvābhāvahetaustataḥ pūrayāte kṣāntipāramitām ||
SA20n1298:74: ( iti bodhicittotpādasūtraśāstre kṣāntipāramitā māna ṣaṣṭho vargaḥ || )
